overview: David a 10-year-old kid, plays in the park with his friends with water guns, they all have fun.  Time passes, the water they play with is wasted drop by drop, and the park dries up.  David is now 30 years old, he has joined a rebel group and kills the first enemy, they want to claim the water that a Private Military Company keeps defended. The battle begins, the rebels gain ground, but the EMPâ€™s decide to drop a nuclear bomb eliminating the rebels and the water source before the rebels win it.  The bomb explodes and returns us to the time were David (10) and his infant friends continue playing, the game and the life still remains.
title: Balas De Agua
